summary:
Inserts a small dungeon with two spell tomes in it.
The player can only obtain one, so choose wisely.
descriptionHtml:
Inserts a small nordic ruin north of Solitude. The ruin contains two spell tomes, each for a
custom spell. The player will only be able to select one tome to read.

One spell is a fire-and-forgot heal over time. With respite, it also restores equal stamina, and a lesser amount of magicka.
The other spell is an explosive projectile. It arcs like a grenade, instead of going straight like a fireball.

There is a quest to send the player to the cave.

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ Copy of the Read Me ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~

~ ~ ~ Grey Mend Sanctum ~ ~ ~

Created by DraconBlade (Steam)/BlackLink16 (Skyrim Nexus)

===========
Description
===========

Inserts a small dungeon with two spell tomes in it.
The player can only obtain one, so choose wisely.

=========
ChangeLog
=========

v1.0 (2013/30/08)
- Initial version.

============
Requirements
============

No requirements other than Skyrim.

============
Installation
============

1. Extract the files to SkyrimData
2. Activate GreyMendSanctum.esp

==================
In-Game Activation
==================

Just enter a town. If already in one, leave and come back again.
This will trigger the courier who will give you the starting letter.

=======
Credits
=======

To get the courier to work:
Skyrim Creation Kit Tutorial 05: A Courier Quest
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iustaHoHnEE

Creation Kit Wiki:
http://www.creationkit.com/
